description: en- +â€Ž vermeil: compare Old French envermeiller.

verbs.description: envermeil (third-person singular simple present envermeils, present participle envermeiling, simple past and past participle envermeiled)

entries.meaning: (obsolete, transitive, poetic) To colour with, or as if with, vermilion; to dye red.
examples: For he being amorous on that lovely die / That did thy cheek envermeil, thought to kiss / But kill'd alas, and then bewayl'd his fatal bliss.
